Description:
Detects the usage of binaries such as 'net', 'sc' or 'powershell' in order to stop, pause, disable or delete critical or important Windows services such as AV, Backup, etc. As seen being used in some ransomware scripts


Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), frack113 , X__Junior
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Windows Service Tampering
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((original_file_name = 'net.exe' or original_file_name = 'net1.exe' or original_file_name = 'powershell.exe' or original_file_name = 'psservice.exe' or original_file_name = 'pwsh.dll' or original_file_name = 'sc.exe') and (process_path like '%\net.exe' or process_path like '%\net1.exe' or process_path like '%\powershell.exe' or process_path like '%\psservice.exe' or process_path like '%\psservice64.exe' or process_path like '%\pwsh.exe' or process_path like '%\sc.exe')) and ((command like '% delete %' or command like '% pause %' or command like '% stop %' or command like '%stop-service %' or command like '%remove-service %') and (command like '%config%' and command like '%start=disabled%')) and (command like '%143svc%' or command like '%acronis vss provider%' or command like '%acronisagent%' or command like '%acrsch2svc%' or command like '%adobearmservice%' or command like '%ahs service%' or command like '%antivirus%' or command like '%apache4%' or command like '%arsm%' or command like '%aswbcc%' or command like '%ateraagent%' or command like '%avast business console client antivirus service%' or command like '%avast! antivirus%' or command like '%avg antivirus%' or command like '%avgadminclient%' or command like '%avgadminserver%' or command like '%avp1%' or command like '%backupexec%' or command like '%bedbg%' or command like '%bits%' or command like '%brokerinfrastructure%' or command like '%caslicenceserver%' or command like '%caswebserver%' or command like '%client agent 7.60%' or command like '%core browsing protection%' or command like '%core mail protection%' or command like '%core scanning server%' or command like '%dcagent%' or command like '%dwmrcs%' or command like '%ehttpsr%' or command like '%ekrn%' or command like '%enterprise client service%' or command like '%epag%' or command like '%epintegrationservice%' or command like '%epprotectedservice%' or command
